testimonials.text: Whether you’re a stay-at-home (SAHM) who wants to make an income, a workforce mom who wants to be a SAHM, or a mom not satisfied with your current career, I have the job for you. No, it’s not selling a product, getting involved with a scam, or even being a telemarketer…it’s called coding..
